name: Shepherds of Chaos
loreDescription: New kinds of Unknown that came to Orbis through Chaos Gates. Their appearance and traits differ from that of the Unknown that previously appeared in Ritania. Most are acting under someone's command, and a few appear to possess some intelligence.

skillDescription.base: As Health decreases, Evasion and Defense increase by up to 20.0%.
skillDescription.max: As Health decreases, Evasion and Defense increase by up to 40.0%.
